dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
L. Bottou
Y. Bengio
P. Haffner
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset is a widely used benchmark dataset for image classification, consisting of handwritten digits from 0 to 9. It contains 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, each of size 28x28 pixels.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:description: Fashion-MNIST is a dataset consisting of 70,000 grayscale images of clothing items, intended as a drop-in replacement for the original MNIST dataset for benchmarking machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Fashion-MNIST

dcterms:description: EMNIST (Extended MNIST) is a dataset that extends the original MNIST dataset to include handwritten letters, providing a more comprehensive benchmark for character recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: EMNIST

dcterms:description: CelebA is a large-scale face attributes dataset with more than 200,000 celebrity images, each annotated with 40 attribute labels, making it suitable for various tasks in facial recognition and attribute prediction.
dcterms:title: CelebA
